thread.title: Breaking news from Team Trump: One Asian, plus one African-American equals a Latino!
thread.title_full: Breaking news from Team Trump: One Asian, plus one African-American equals a Latino!

author: rss@dailykos.com (Barbara Morrill)
title: Breaking news from Team Trump: One Asian, plus one African-American equals a Latino!
text:
40 "Okay, where did I put the vial of Asian?" 
This applies to both the Department of You Can’t Make This Shit Up AND The Department of Who Knew, from incoming White House spokesman Sean Spicer: x 
Spicer asked about lack of Latino in cabinet by @kwelkernbc cites Elaine Chao and literally points to Ben Carson in the room. — Adrian Carrasquillo (@Carrasquillo) January 19, 2017 
Discuss.
